drills.name: Driver Drill 1
drills.description: Tee up the ball and focus on swinging slowly to feel the club's head making contact and promoting a smooth follow-through.

drills.name: Driver Drill 2
drills.description: Practice hitting drivers aiming at distant targets, focusing on consistent carry distance to build feel for power.

drills.name: Driver Drill 3
drills.description: Swing the driver with eyes closed after setup to heighten awareness of body movement and club position.

drills.name: 5-Wood Drill 1
drills.description: Hit from the fairway or mat, focusing on sweeping the ball to improve contact and launch.

drills.name: 5-Wood Drill 2
drills.description: Aim at targets 180-220 yards away and try to land balls consistently for distance feel.

drills.name: 5-Wood Drill 3
drills.description: Swing the 5-wood in slow motion without a ball to promote smooth rhythm and transitions.

drills.name: Hybrid Drill 1
drills.description: Hit hybrids from various lies, focusing on sweeping motions for consistent contact.

drills.name: Hybrid Drill 2
drills.description: Aim at intermediate targets to build accuracy and distance control with the hybrid.

drills.name: Hybrid Drill 3
drills.description: Swing with a pause at the top to feel weight shift and maintain club control.

drills.name: 6-Iron Drill 1
drills.description: Hit shots with feet together to improve balance and feel for the club's weight during the swing.

drills.name: 6-Iron Drill 2
drills.description: Swing at 50% speed to emphasize smooth tempo and achieve consistent distance.

drills.name: 6-Iron Drill 3
drills.description: Practice one-handed swings to build feel for arm and body synchronization.

drills.name: 7-Iron Drill 1
drills.description: Hit punch shots keeping the ball low to develop control and trajectory feel.

drills.name: 7-Iron Drill 2
drills.description: Focus on rotating hips through impact for better power and swing consistency.

drills.name: 7-Iron Drill 3
drills.description: Hold the finish position after each swing to check and improve balance.

drills.name: 8-Iron Drill 1
drills.description: Hit to targets at 130-150 yards, focusing on accuracy and ball stop.

drills.name: 8-Iron Drill 2
drills.description: Focus on shoulder turn in the backswing for consistent power generation.

drills.name: 8-Iron Drill 3
drills.description: Hit alternating full and punch shots to control distance variations.

drills.name: 9-Iron Drill 1
drills.description: Aim at short-range targets (100-120 yards) for precision approach shots.

drills.name: 9-Iron Drill 2
drills.description: Hit with a shortened backswing to emphasize control and acceleration.

drills.name: 9-Iron Drill 3
drills.description: Practice knockdown shots for low-flight control and consistency.

drills.name: Pitching Wedge Drill 1
drills.description: Practice partial swings from 50-100 yards to improve distance control.

drills.name: Pitching Wedge Drill 2
drills.description: Hit chips with the pitching wedge focusing on low running shots.

drills.name: Pitching Wedge Drill 3
drills.description: Focus on accelerating through impact for crisp contact and feel.

drills.name: Sand Wedge Drill 1
drills.description: Practice high soft lobs around the green to develop touch and loft feel.

drills.name: Sand Wedge Drill 2
drills.description: Hit long shots focusing on carry distance and control.

drills.name: Sand Wedge Drill 3
drills.description: Practice fairway chips for low runners and overall versatility.

drills.name: Putter Drill 1
drills.description: Putt to various distances focusing on distance control and speed.

drills.name: Putter Drill 2
drills.description: Putt with eyes closed to develop feel for stroke length.

drills.name: Putter Drill 3
drills.description: Practice pendulum motion with shoulders for smooth rhythm.
